Title: Certified
Writer: Tamara P. Carter (story editor), Nick Cuse (story editor), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Patrick Somerville, Carly Wray
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Jovan Adepo
Plot: Laurie Garvey, a former therapist, must become one again as she heads to Australia to help Nora and Kevin along their paths.
